Title: Quarantine
Writer: John Erick Dowdle (screenplay by), Drew Dowdle (screenplay by), Jaume Balaguer√≥ (based on the motion picture "Rec" written by), Luiso Berdejo (based on the motion picture "Rec" written by), Paco Plaza (based on the motion picture "Rec" written by)

Plot: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.
